Package toxi.math.waves


Class Summary
AbstractWave Abstract wave oscillator type which needs to be subclassed to implement different waveforms.
AMFMSineWave Amplitude and frequency modulated sine wave.
ConstantWave Implements a constant value as waveform.
FMHarmonicSquareWave Frequency modulated bandwidth-limited square wave using a fourier series of harmonics.
FMSawtoothWave Frequency modulated bandwidth unlimited pure sawtooth wave.
FMSineWave Frequency modulated sine wave.
FMSquareWave Frequency modulated bandwidth unlimited pure digital square wave.
FMTriangleWave Implements a frequency modulated triangular wave with its peak at PI: "/\"
SineWave Standard Sine wave at fixed frequency and values normalized to the given amplitude.
WaveState
